title: Fork, 1985-103-221, ca. 1700–1800
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Silver-gilt fork, three-tined flaring at the join. Waisted shoulder, banded ferrule. Tapering porcelain handle, irregular in shape. Multi-colored decoration on white ground. On front a man in costume, standing in front of a tree. On the back a woman in similar position. Blue scalloped pattern with red scrolls on top and end of handle.
